Name: Sliding Blocks
About the game: Sliding Blocks is a fun and classic addictive puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the orange block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way, try to unblock it with the minimal moves. Sliding Blocks with 4 difficulties of puzzles ranging from Beginner to Master. HOW TO PLAY: • Need to move the orange block to the exit. • Horizontal blocks can be moved from side to side • Vertical blocks can be moved up and down FEATURES: - 4 Difficulties (Beginner, Medium, Hard, Master) - Hundreds of levels - Undo system - Great sound effects
